messages.message:
Hi team,
The summary (description) is not displaying for some of the apps. When you open the app, the description is visible, but it doesn’t appear on this link: https://aihub.instabase.com/hub?tab=All.
I’ve attached a few screenshots for reference.
cc: @Anshu
Good catch! filed this bug to track it. If you're the app owner & update the description, does it start to appear?
Yes, it’s working for the app owner after updating the description.
